Content.Title: Projects
Content.Description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.

Projects.Heading: Ramaa Creations
Projects.Description: Built with Alicms tool at Alibaba Cloud Low-Code Development Contest 2022. Achieved second position out of 2043 participants.

Projects.Heading: Visits Counter
Projects.SubHeading: Web Visits Counter with Dynamic UI
Projects.Description: The Visits Counter project is a real-time web application that features a dynamic and responsive user interface, built with MongoDB, Express, React, and Tailwind CSS. The application displays website visits through an SVG badge.

Projects.Heading: FarmConnect
Projects.Description: Built with .NET, Angular, and SQL Server, FarmConnect streamlines tasks like health tracking, inventory management, and resource coordination, enhancing productivity and collaboration within the agricultural community.

Projects.Heading: StackOverflow Clone
Projects.SubHeading: A question-answer website with chatbot feature
Projects.Description: A popular online forum for programming-related questions and answers built using MERN Stack, and it features user authentication, a voting system for answers, and keyword-based question search.

Projects.Heading: Amazon Clone
Projects.Description: This project includes a range of features including user authentication, a shopping cart, product details page, payment processing and order history.

Projects.Heading: MyChat
Projects.Description: A simple Android chat app allows users to communicate with each other through text messages on their Android devices. The app typically features a user-friendly interface and easy-to-use chat functions.
